title: Blog-Based Social Learning Project: Strengthening Knowledge Sharing and Collaborative Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate or higher understanding of social science domains
context.additional_context: For students/job seekers, using blogs as a learning tool to explore advanced topics in social studies and share outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can write critical analyses on specific topics in the social sciences through blog posts at least five times.
Learners can provide constructive feedback on peers' blogs and contribute to collaborative knowledge building.
Learners can interpret reader response data through blog traffic analysis and improve content strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
